root.name: println()
root.description: Writes to the text area of the Processing environment's console. This is often helpful for looking at the data a program is producing. Each call to this function creates a new line of output. Individual elements can be separated with quotes ("") and joined with the string concatenation operator (+) except when printing array data.

parameter.label: data
parameter.description: boolean, byte, char, color, int, float, String, boolean[], byte[], char[], color[], int[], float[], or String[]
